description:
~~ 8 educational activities & games inside + a full interactive Twinkle Twinkle song ~~
~~ More than 2,000,000 downloads, Selected New and Noteworthy by Apple! ~~
~~ Superb HD illustrations and sounds ~~

A wonderful and new way to enjoy the classic “Twinkle twinkle little star” song. An all in one collection of intuitive and educational games, including the a vivid interactive and high quality production of the beloved song. This application provides the perfect place to learn and play in an enjoyable and rich environment.

INTERACTIVE SING ALONG
Animated, Interactive sing along story book for children - The classic “Twinkle Twinkle Little Star” song comes to life in an interactive rich song and dance experience.
- Rich animations and activities on all pages
- Full sing along
- HD quality graphics and sounds

COLORING BOOK
Enjoy the twinkle star coloring page and happy coloring pages of the horoscope signs.
- Select between 10 different colors
- Fill area with paint bucket
- Interactive, animated drawing activities

GALAXY PUZZLES
Enjoy a rich puzzle activity while learning spelling and vocabulary. Improve fine motor skills while placing the puzzle pieces into place.
- 3 Puzzle worlds with different items
- Learn spelling and vocabulary
- Child friendly autocomplete button

123 COUNT
Tap to count the shining stars. Learn to count from 1 to 10 with the twinkling stars. The stars fly and move on screen - tap them to learn the next number. Each stage another star will be added and the stars will become smaller and more challenging to count.
- learn basic numbers
- Enjoy adorable animations during the game
- Rewarding environment with no wrong answers
- Child friendly autocomplete button

PEEKABOO STAR
Where is the shining star hiding? Fun educational activity for toddlers, practice and train cognitive skills in this fun and addictive hide and seek game. Improve motor skills and Spatial perception.
- Engaging and rewarding activity
- Fun animations and sounds
- Happy and cheerful environment

ZODIAC MEMORY GAME
Intuitive, educational preschool memory game. Play the classic memory game and learn the ZODIAC sign while improving memory & concentration skills.
- Intuitive game levels system
- Child friendly autocomplete button
- Learn the names of zodiac signs

STAR MAZE
Star maze is an interactive intuitive drawing puzzle. Help the stars find each other across the maze. Draw a line between the stars from one side of the maze to the other, overcome obstacles along the way and solve the puzzle.
- Puzzle Painting activity
- Interactive animations
- Increasing difficulty levels

CONNECT THE DOTS
Connect dot to dot and learn the 12 signs of the zodiac along with their images, names and spelling: Aquarius, Pisces, Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius and Capricorn.
- Tap the dots in the correct order to complete the shape
- Child friendly autocomplete button

ABOUT TabTale
With over 400 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. TabTale’s interactive storybooks provide an exciting reading experience for the most beloved children's stories. Each book inspires young children’s creativity and imagination.
Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ 
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale
Follow us:@Tabtale
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale

CONTACT US 
Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: 
* This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
* By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.
Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
